CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1963, pg. 13, reads: "Crucifixion - Harold Neal, self-taught artist of exceptional gifts, poses with his painting 'The Crucifixion,' one of the most-talked-about works on display at the 'Showcase on Art.'  It depicts Christ on the cross, extending his hand to receive a Roman soldier's crushing blow. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Harold Neal standing next to his painting depicting Christ being nailed to the cross
